overview: Vic O’Rorke is an ex-cop with a private investigator’s license. He handles cases where he can exact vigilante justice and make a tidy sum for himself. In this episode, he takes on a case where a boyfriend has been kidnapped for ransom money. Vic is able to deduce the location of the hideout and formulate a plan all by going through his client’s mobile phone. During the daring rescue he finds one of the hoods is also a cop and a deal is born.
tagline: Ex cop freed a kidnap victim, kills a gang, and takes their loot.
title: Hell Gate Narrows
